name: RadioCrawsham
0:
”Alexa, open radio crawsham”
”Alexa, start radio crawsham”
”Alexa, ask radio crawsham what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio crawsham
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The right place for upbeat radio!
PLAYING THE BEST MUSIC HITS AROUND
We only play the biggest hits from today to the great songs of yesterday ....... the ones that you still love are all here under one roof!
Adult Contemporary Local Radio like it should be & Local Radio like it use to be!
We focus on local issues, local news & views. If it`s happening we think you should know! We aim to put a spotlight on small local businesses in our area and will showcase the talent out there.
Back to the music, our special regular evening & weekend shows feature the best local DJ talent who play the best in everything from Indie Music, Dance Music, Ska, Reggae, Northern Soul, Motown, with featured shows from the 60s, 70s, 80s 90s 00's and much more
Radio Crawsham
Local radio like it should be
Turn Us On!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
